title: Test
summary: This bar chart has 2 categories on the x axis representing Day, and Circulation in each Day on the y axis.
The highest category is found at Sunday where Circulation is 378602.0.
The lowest category is found at Daily where Circulation is 130283.0.
The highest value at Sunday is almost 2.91 times larger than the minimum value of Daily.
The highest value at Sunday is almost 2.91 times larger than the minimum value of Daily.
The difference between the max Day Sunday and min Day Daily is 248319.0.
